metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13988 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Contiki through 3.0. An Integer Overflow exists in the uIP TCP/IP Stack component when parsing TCP MSS options of IPv4 network packets in uip_process in net/ipv4/uip.c.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Jos Wetzels, Stanislav Dashevskyi, Amine Amri

notes.Note: sbeattie> aka FSCT-2020-0008 issue in embedded copy of uIP mdeslaur> per upstream "iscsiuio only uses uip for network "services", such as DHCP, ARP, etc, and not for normal TCP/IP communications"

criterions.comment: open-iscsi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
